[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@multiversx/sdk-core](./sdk-core.md) &gt; [RelayedTransactionV2Builder](./sdk-core.relayedtransactionv2builder.md) &gt; [setInnerTransaction](./sdk-core.relayedtransactionv2builder.setinnertransaction.md)

## RelayedTransactionV2Builder.setInnerTransaction() method

Sets the inner transaction to be used. It has to be already signed and with gasLimit set to 0. These checks are performed on the build() method

**Signature:**

```typescript
setInnerTransaction(transaction: Transaction): RelayedTransactionV2Builder;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  transaction | [Transaction](./sdk-core.transaction.md) | The inner transaction to be used |

**Returns:**

[RelayedTransactionV2Builder](./sdk-core.relayedtransactionv2builder.md)
